definition: A person who travels on a vehicle, typically for the purpose of transportation, often referring to someone who is not part of the crew or staff.

examples.german: Der Passagier stieg in das Flugzeug ein.
Die Passagiere wurden gebeten, ihre Sicherheitsgurte anzulegen.
examples.english: The passengers were asked to fasten their seat belts.

examples.german: Der Zug hatte viele Passagiere an Bord.
examples.english: The train had many passengers on board.

examples.german: Der Passagier war mit dem Service zufrieden.
examples.english: The passenger was satisfied with the service.

examples.german: Die Passagiere wurden am Flughafen abgeholt.
examples.english: The passengers were picked up at the airport.
